posts.description: Hezbollah May Come Out of the Syrian Civil War Stronger Than Ever | War Is Boring
posts.extended: When Sheikh Hassan Nasrallah confirmed in May 2013 that Hezbollah had joined the Syrian Civil War on the side of Pres. Bashar Al Assad’s embattled government, it marked a major political and military shift for the Lebanese Shi’ite militia.

posts.description: You Don't Throw a Basketball, So Why Is It Called a Free Throw? A VICE Sports Investigation | VICE Sports
posts.extended: Welcome. After reading this, you're either going to think the next few minutes of your life were a quirky digression into curious basketball trivia, or you're going to scream that you've just wasted two minutes of your life and you want them back.

posts.description: Woody Guthrie, 'Old Man Trump' and a real estate empire's racist foundations
posts.extended: In December 1950, Woody Guthrie signed his name to the lease of a new apartment in Brooklyn. Even now, over half a century later, that uninspiring document prompts a double-take.

posts.description: The Stoned Immaculate: Meet the Weed Nuns of the San Joaquin Valley | VICE | Canada
posts.extended: Last October, California Governor Jerry Brown signed the Medical Marijuana Regulation and Safety Act into law, requiring local jurisdictions to develop their own marijuana regulations by March 1, 2016, or relinquish authority to the state government.

posts.description: Young Thug Talks About His Eclectic Style: "Simple Minded People Don't Understand" | Complex
posts.extended: Young Thug recently sat down with Sway Calloway to discuss his personal style. The rapper not only touched on his unique style when it comes to music, but also his forward-thinking approach towards fashion and the people who don't quite get it.
